testcase.name: Cancel_Checkout
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
scenario: Cancel checkout given User login as 'problem' user ... passed in 5.597s then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.0768s when User adds item 'backpack' to the cart ... passed in 1.224s when User adds item 'Onesie' to the cart ... passed in 1.209s when User clicks on the cart icon ... passed in 1.206s when User proceeds to checkout page ... passed in 1.21s e when User fills checkout details with first name:'John', last name:'Problem', and postal code:'12345' ... passed in 3.351s when User clicks Cancel on overview ... passed in 1.202s then User navigates to the cart page ... passed in 0.02493s then The cart badge should show the correct number of items ... passed in 0.01396s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Error_On_Empty_Checkout_Fields
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
scenario: Error on empty checkout fields given User login as 'problem' user ... passed in 5.785s then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.06782s when User adds item 'backpack' to the cart ... passed in 1.199s when User adds item 'Onesie' to the cart ... passed in 1.182s when User clicks on the cart icon ... passed in 1.204s when User proceeds to checkout page ... passed in 1.242s e when User fills checkout details with first name:'John', last name:'Problem', and postal code:'12345' ... passed in 3.799s then User continue from checkout overview ... passed in 1.208s then Error: Last Name is required should be displayed ... passed in 0.01894s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
